mapper.insert: insert into c_trade( id, owner, amount, name, expectedTradeDate, stage, type, source, createBy, createTime, description, contactMinute, nextContactTime, customerId, activityId, contactId )values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{amount}, #{name}, #{expectedTradeDate}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactMinute}, #{nextContactTime}, #{customerId}, #{activityId}, #{contactId} )
mapper.select:
select
t.id, u.name as owner, t.name, t.stage, t.type, t.source, ctr.name as customerId, ctt.name as contactId
from c_trade t join c_user u on t.owner = u.id join c_customer ctr on t.customerId = ctr.id join c_contact ctt on t.contactId = ctt.id
and t.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and u.name like concat('%', #{owner}, '%')
and ctr.name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%')
and t.stage like concat('%', #{stage}, '%')
and t.type like concat('%', #{type}, '%')
and t.source like concat('%', #{source}, '%')
and ctt.name like concat('%', #{contactName}, '%')
order by t.createTime desc
limit #{skipCount}, #{pageSize}

select count(*)
